Name: Smokyflex
About the game: You start the game in the dungeon. Alien mutants want to take over the whole world. We need to resist this. Kill monsters and move to the next level. Collect abilities to be stronger and more active. Defeat bosses and go through the storyline. Game Features: - Pixel graphics - Hero weapon upgrade system - Final Boss - Soundtrack
